hero.title: Let's Start a Conversation
hero.subtitle: Get in Touch
hero.description: Have a project in mind? Want to discuss how we can help? We'd love to hear from you.

faqs.question: What is your typical project timeline?
faqs.answer: Project timelines vary based on scope and complexity. A typical web application takes 2-4 months, while larger enterprise projects may take 6-12 months. We provide detailed timelines during the discovery phase.

faqs.question: Do you work with startups?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We love working with startups and have helped launch many successful companies. We offer flexible engagement models and can work within startup budgets.

faqs.question: What is your pricing model?
faqs.answer: We offer both fixed-price and time-and-materials engagements. Pricing depends on project scope, complexity, and timeline. Contact us for a custom quote.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing support after launch?
faqs.answer: Yes! We offer various support and maintenance packages to ensure your application continues to run smoothly post-launch. We also provide monitoring, updates, and feature enhancements.

faqs.question: Can you work with our existing team?
faqs.answer: Definitely. We frequently collaborate with in-house teams, either augmenting your development capacity or providing specialized expertise for specific projects.

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: We specialize in modern web and mobile technologies including React, Next.js, React Native, Node.js, Python, AWS, and more. Check our Services page for a complete list.
